verses.verse: Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H6030>hear<s%> <S%H6041>me<s%>: for I am poor and <S%H34>needy<s%>.
<S%H8104>Preserve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; for I am <S%H2623>holy<s%>: O you my <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H3467>save<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> that trusts in <S%H982>you<s%>.
Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H136>me<s%>, O Lord: for I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto you <S%H3117>daily<s%>.
<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>: for unto <S%H136>you<s%>, O Lord, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For <S%H136>you<s%>, Lord, are <S%H2896>good<s%>, and ready to <S%H5546>forgive<s%>; and <S%H7227>plentiful<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto all them that call upon <S%H7121>you<s%>.
Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, unto my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>; and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H6030>you<s%>: for you will answer me.
Among the <S%H430>gods<s%> there is none like unto <S%H136>you<s%>, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto your <S%H4639>works<s%>.

All <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom you have <S%H6213>made<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H136>you<s%>, O Lord; and shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For you are <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%>: you are God <S%H430>alone<s%>.

<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me your <S%H1870>way<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in your <S%H571>truth<s%>: <S%H3161>unite<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>.
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H136>you<s%>, O Lord my <S%H430>God<s%>, with all my <S%H3824>heart<s%>: and I will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> toward <S%H5337>me<s%>: and you have delivered my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>hell<s%>.

O <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H2086>proud<s%> are <S%H6965>risen<s%> against <S%H5712>me<s%>, and the assemblies of <S%H6184>violent<s%> men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; and have not set you before <S%H7760>them<s%>.

But <S%H136>you<s%>, O Lord, are a <S%H410>God<s%> full of <S%H7349>compassion<s%>, and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>longsuffering<s%>, and <S%H7227>plentiful<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>.

O <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto <S%H2603>me<s%>, and have mercy upon <S%H5414>me<s%>; give your <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto your <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid<s%>.

<S%H6213>Show<s%> me a <S%H226>token<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>; that they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H954>it<s%>, and be ashamed: because <S%H3068>you<s%>, Lord, have <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5162>me<s%>, and comforted me.
